original_text: So the king of the south shall come into his kingdom, and shall return into his own land.
korean_text: 북방 왕이 남방 왕의 왕국으로 쳐들어갈 것이나 자기 본국으로 물러가리라

sentences.original_text: So the king of the south shall come into his kingdom
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 남방 왕은 그의 왕국에 들어갈 것이요

sentences.original_text: and shall return into his own land
